tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE usage_statistics_of_robotic_surgical_systems (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    surgeon_id INT,
    operation_date DATE,
    duration INT,
    cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_planning_and_optimization (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    cost DECIMAL,
    completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE robotic_surgical_systems (
	system_id INT,
	manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
	model VARCHAR(255),
	usage_hours INT,
	last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
	history_id INT,
	system_id INT,
	maintenance_date DATE,
	maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
	maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE usage_statistics (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_duration INT,
    usage_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Usage_Statistics (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  procedure_id INT REFERENCES Surgical_Procedures(procedure_id),
  surgeon_id INT REFERENCES Surgeon_Statistics(surgeon_id),
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  robot_model_id INT REFERENCES Robot_Models(model_id)
);
